name: Paste HTML as GitHub Flavored Markdown
description: With this script, forked from paste-html-as-github-markdown, you can right click in the note edit and paste previously copied HTML from a website as GitHub Flavored Markdown (gfm) with the help of Pandoc. Dependencies Pandoc Installation After you have installed Pandoc you have to configure its path in the script settings. If converting with gfm is not producting the right results in QOwnNotes, try with the original paste-html-as-github-markdown script
